title: Science Explorers
description: Think like a scientist and explain how things work!

prompts.input: Plants need sunlight to grow. What do you think would happen to a plant if you put it in a dark closet for two weeks? Explain why you think that would happen.
hints: What do plants use sunlight for?
What happens when something doesn't get what it needs?

prompts.input: When you put ice cubes in a glass of water on a warm day, the ice melts. Where does the ice go? What happens to it?
hints: Think about what ice is made of
Does the ice disappear or change into something?
